input.sentences: one night everyone at work left the office building and instead of going home decided to have a party .
pictures started before they even got to the bar .
then | everyone gathered for a group picture .
output.sentences: Night time is the best time for an office party.
We took pictures at the bar before the party started.
Here we are enjoying our drinks.
We took lots of selfies tonight.
At the end of the night we gathered for one last picture.
